goals_text: Pay down credit card debt quickly while building a small emergency fund.
Keep mortgage payments stable and reduce high-interest debt.
Grow investments but keep enough cash for a 3-month emergency fund.
Preserve capital with low volatility and stable income.
Cover essentials with zero income and avoid new debt.
Maximize long-term returns but avoid large drawdowns and keep an emergency fund.
I want high returns with no volatility and no risk.
Pay off student loans and save for a dependent's education.
Reduce monthly expenses and stop overdrafts.
